string.text: Command System
Command System
Middle Click to select formation
You can directly select formation by pressing {KeyName} on them. Selected formation will be highlighted with outline.
Highlight selected formation
Selected formation will be highlighted with outline.
Enable Attack Specific Formation
You can give order to attack a specific formation by pressing {KeyName} on enemy formation. Also applied to AI.
After enemy formation eliminated
Behavior when the attacked enemy formation is eliminated.
Highlight target formation
Target formation will be highlighted with outline.
Enable highlight on rts view only
Only enable highlight on rts view. In normal mode formation will not be highlighted.
More Visible Movement Target
Make Movement Target more visible.
More visible Movement Target on rts view only
Make Movement Target more visible on rts view only. Keep the original appearance on normal mode.
CommandSystem Hot Key
Select Formation
Select your formation or order your selected formations to attack an enemy formation.
You tactic level should be at least {level}
